item.title: The American Soul: A Way Forward on Juneteenth
item.description: A State of Emergency In the past three months, the soul of America has been laid bare in increasing amounts as we address our society’s response to our impaired health, economic, and political processes. There is a single crisis in all of this: our attitude as citizens to come together and solve any problem. America has been divided and exploited by those who profit by perpetuating the current system of inequalities of our society.

item.title: Why is DevOps So Hard?
item.description: This Calm.io blog recap was originally written and posted by me on October 20, 2015 at http://calm.io/2015/10/20/why-is-devops-so-hard/, and slightly enhanced on February 27, 2018, be sure to see the Postscript for significant developments!

item.title: DevOps Demystified
item.description: For a term that is not even six years old, DevOps remains a mysterious pursuit for many software engineering organizations. Let me define DevOps to help you understand and chart your own journey. Hint: it is a cultural term!

item.title: I Dream of DevOps, but What is DevOps?
item.description: This Calm.io blog recap was originally written and posted by me on September 23, 2015 at http://calm.io/2015/09/23/i-dream-of-devops-but-what-is-devops/, and slightly enhanced on February 18, 2018, be sure to see the Postscript for significant developments!
